info.title: Instructure Canvas Global API
info.description: Canvas LMS includes a REST API for accessing and modifying data externally from the main application, in your own programs and scripts.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The new outcome group description.

parameters.name: parent_outcome_group_id
parameters.description: The id of the new parent outcome group.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The new outcome group title.

parameters.name: vendor_guid
parameters.description: A custom GUID for the learning standard.

parameters.name: source_outcome_group_id
parameters.description: The ID of the source outcome group.

parameters.name: calculation_int
parameters.description: The new calculation int.  Only applies if the calculation_method isnu201cdecaying_averageu201d or u201cn_masteryu201d

parameters.name: calculation_method
parameters.description: The new calculation method.  Defaults to u201chighestu201dnn        n        n          Allowed values: decaying_average, n_mastery, latest, highest

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the new outcome.

parameters.name: display_name
parameters.description: A friendly name shown in reports for outcomes with cryptic titles, such asncommon core standards names.

parameters.name: mastery_points
parameters.description: The mastery threshold for the embedded rubric criterion.

parameters.name: outcome_id
parameters.description: The ID of the existing outcome to link.

parameters.name: ratings[][description]
parameters.description: The description of a rating level for the embedded rubric criterion.

parameters.name: ratings[][points]
parameters.description: The points corresponding to a rating level for the embedded rubricncriterion.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the new outcome. Required if outcome_id is absent.

parameters.description: A custom GUID for the learning standard.
